innovation_creation.description: When your client made a difference or created something new

leadership_initiative.description: When your client is the one who got the ball rolling

management_oversight.description: When your client was the one in charge

leadership_supervisory.description: When describing leadership and supervisory responsibilities

execution_delivery.description: When your client is the one through whom it happened

improvement_optimization.description: When improving or optimizing existing systems/processes

analysis_research.description: When analyzing data or conducting research

collaboration_facilitation.description: When working with others or enabling collaboration

usage_rules: Use varied verbs - avoid repeating the same verb multiple times
Choose verbs that accurately reflect the level of contribution
Match verb intensity to actual responsibility (don't oversell)
Use present tense for current roles, past tense for previous roles
Start every bullet point with a strong action verb
Avoid weak verbs like 'helped', 'worked on', 'responsible for'
